name: 无名录
description:
“Nameless record”is a retro style strategy war chess game.

The film takes the stage of the Empire of insalam on the land of irolan. The player will play the role of emperor of Empire, take over the ancient empire with many wounds, lead the army to pacify the rebellion, recover the homeland and restore the glory of this great empire.

The dust and haze of civil strife has been washed away, and the warriors of the Empire are ready for the Queen's call:

-Tortuous tragic plot, experience the vicissitudes of the times

-50 chapters of the story and 25 chapters of the additional campaign, a total of more than 40 hours of game experience

-Hundreds of weapons, armor, accessories, medicines and other props are flexibly combined to create an invincible army

-More than 40 charismatic generals with their own characteristics and hidden roles such as boss can be recruited to experience the fun of training

-At challenging levels, the enemy will use a series of tactics to fight against the players' wisdom and courage, and test your command and strategy

-There are two kinds of difficulty to choose, and challenge difficulty can get more hidden reward
